description: The 'Customers_and_Loan_prepared' dataset provides a comprehensive view of customer profiles and their loan details. It includes demographic information such as age, date of birth, and state of residence, as well as financial data like monthly income, interest rates, and FICO scores. The dataset is particularly useful for financial institutions and analysts looking to assess creditworthiness, understand customer demographics, and evaluate loan performance. It includes key indicators such as debt-to-income ratio and loan purpose, which are critical for risk assessment and decision-making processes. The dataset's structure allows for detailed analysis of loan status, default rates, and the impact of various factors on loan acceptance. With its rich set of attributes, this dataset can be used for predictive modeling, customer segmentation, and financial forecasting. It is an invaluable resource for developing strategies to improve loan approval processes and enhance customer relationship management.
shortDesc: Customer loan dataset with financial and demographic details.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Unique customer identifier, bigint, key for records.

columns.name: Status
columns.comment: Loan application status, string, indicates approval.

columns.name: Date_Of_Birth_parsed
columns.comment: Customer's birth date, date, for age calculation.

columns.name: Age
columns.comment: Customer's age, bigint, derived from birth date.

columns.name: Monthly_Income
columns.comment: Customer's monthly income, double, financial capacity.

columns.name: State
columns.comment: Customer's US state, string, geographic location.

columns.name: Interest_Rate
columns.comment: Loan interest rate, double, cost of borrowing.

columns.name: FICO_Range
columns.comment: FICO score range, string, creditworthiness indicator.

columns.name: FICO_max
columns.comment: Maximum FICO score, bigint, credit risk measure.

columns.name: FICO_min
columns.comment: Minimum FICO score, bigint, credit risk measure.

columns.name: Default
columns.comment: Loan default indicator, double, risk assessment.

columns.name: Amount_Requested
columns.comment: Loan amount requested, bigint, financial need.

columns.name: Loan_Purpose
columns.comment: Purpose of loan, string, reason for borrowing.

columns.name: Loan_Length
columns.comment: Loan term length, string, repayment period.

columns.name: Home_Ownership
columns.comment: Customer's home ownership status, string, asset indicator.
